content: pattern corrections the pdf was updated on 1/18/19 with corrected seaming instructions please be sure to download the latest version now at version 3 as of jan 1 2024 olive is an easy knitted poncho knit lengthwise with alternating columns of stockinette and reverse stockinette stitch one end is joined to the body to create the opening for the head and neck knit this simple layering piece with berroco vintage® **sizes** directions are for women s size small/medium changes for size large/x-large are in parentheses **finished measurements** approximately 22 24 wide x 46 54 long before sewing shown in size small/medium **materials** berroco vintage 100 grs 4 5 hanks #51109 beet root **needles and notions** straight needles size 9 5 50 mm or size to obtain gauge **gauge** 18 sts and 24 row = 4 in rib pattern
